thread.section_title: Link Interactive Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Link Interactive | linkinteractive.com
thread.title: Zeynel

author: Zeynel
title: Zeynel
text:
I called ADT to get a Quote: and they were nothing but salespersons. They did not even listen my needs or try to help. When I said I will research a bit more and call back, they had an attitude so that is when I knew I am not calling them back. Luckily, I found Link Interactive based on their amazing reviews and I could not be happier that I did.
When you call them, there is no pressure whatsoever. They are genuinely trying to help. In the end, I got a much better deal and their service is exceptional. Self install was super simple, everything went smooth and when I had any questions, it was answered right away. You cannot go wrong with Link Interactive, give them a try, you won't regret.
